channel.title: PostgreSQL on Ye Zheng's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in PostgreSQL on Ye Zheng's Blog

item.title: PostgreSQL
item.description: Installing PostgreSQL $ sudo pacman -S postgresql $ sudo -u postgres -i [postgres]$ initdb --locale $LANG -E UTF8 -D '/var/lib/postgres/data' [postgres]$ exit $ pg_ctl -D /var/lib/postgres/data -l logfile start $ systemctl start postgresql.service $ systemctl enable postgresql.service Create your first database/user Access the database shell $ [postgres]$ psql -d myDatabaseName \help \c <database> \du # list all users and their permission levels \dt # show summary information about all tables \q \?
